description: Terminology from the 「Goods Circle」 (character goods community). 「Guzi」 is a transliteration of 「goods」. 「Qiagu」 means the same thing.

examples.chinese: 从今天开始吃谷只买特别喜欢的
examples.translation: Starting today, I will only buy character goods that I especially like

examples.chinese: 昨天吃谷好像花了一千多块有点罪恶
examples.translation: I feel a bit guilty for spending over 1000 yuan on goods yesterday

examples.chinese: 特么的,不是必需品,但是不能不吃谷啊
examples.translation: Damn it, it's not a necessity, but I can't stop buying goods
